name: poemdictation
0:
”Alexa, open poem dictation.”
”Give me a poem.”
”Read a poem to me.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: poem dictation
des: There should not be any major requirements or prerequisites in order to use this skill. This skill comes pre-loaded with 25 short poems, mostly written by well-known poets.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
